product_name: Shimano Deore M590 Top-Swing Front Derailleur
long_description: The Shimano Deore M590 top-swing front derailleur features a wide pivot link design for outstanding torsional rigidity which improves shifting response and service life. Suppressed flex creates sharp, precise shifts that are fast and smooth, even from low to high gears off the saddle. Dual-pull design allows it to be used with top or bottom cable routing. Multiclamp band is compatible with all frame dimensions (adapters utilized for 28.6, 31.8 and 34.9mm sizes). Hyperdrive system. Suitable for all the latest full-suspension mountain-bike frames. Total capacity: 22T.
short_description: The Shimano Deore M590 top-swing front derailleur features a wide pivot link design for outstanding torsional rigidity which improves shifting response and service life.
